pr_title: Avoid including platform BOM twice in the Gradle plugin

timeline.message:
Avoid including platform BOM twice in the Gradle plugin

Fixes #11251

Add test

timeline.bodyText: Do we really want to compare with the version?
timeline.author: gsmet

replies.bodyText: The version will (or should) always be the same here
replies.author: gastaldi

replies.bodyText: @gastaldi as @gsmet pointed out, I think we should have the same bahavior as for extensions which is to skip it if it's already there whatever the version.
replies.author: ia3andy

replies.bodyText: @ia3andy although working with the model as a big String in the case of Gradle is a PITA, I think that might make sense, let's do that in a separate PR
replies.author: gastaldi

timeline.bodyText: It seems really weird to have the quarkus bom insertion as part of the addDependencyInModel
timeline.author: ia3andy

replies.bodyText: Why? You can have other BOMs when using the extension registry
replies.author: gastaldi

replies.bodyText: aww right, I forgot about that :)
replies.author: ia3andy

replies.bodyText: The extension registry creates an ExtensionInstallPlan with the extensions and BOMs needed to work, which then it's up to the ExtensionManager to decide what needs to be added/changed/etc
replies.author: gastaldi

replies.bodyText: @gastaldi do you use the currently installed extensions to create that plan?
replies.author: ia3andy

replies.bodyText: No, it's up to the ExtensionManager to decide what to do with the ExtensionInstallPlan and the currently installed extensions
replies.author: gastaldi

replies.bodyText: ok ;-) I just wanted to make sure that my other comment about the version was relevant..
replies.author: ia3andy

timeline.message: Do not check the version when comparing the BOM

timeline.bodyText: It's better but works on the assumption that these properties are used. In general there could be any property or direct coordinates.
timeline.author: aloubyansky
